Professional Experience 9/70-Present: Assistant Professor to Associate Professor, Dept. of Microbiology, 9/70- 7/80; Professor, Dept. of Molecular Biology and Biochemistry, 7/80- and Vice Chair 7/89-94, Rutgers University, New Brunswick, NJ. Research and Teaching in Biochemistry. (Research Fellow in Biochemistry, Dept. of Biochemistry, University of Bristol, U. K., 77-78; Visiting Professor, Dept. of Molecular Biology & Biotechnology, Univ. of Sheffield, U. K. , 92). 10/68-9/70 Postdoctoral Fellow, Dept. of Physiological Chemistry, Roche Institute of Molecular Biology, Nutley, NJ.
